mapper.select: SELECT ri.id AS result_info_id, ri.game_info_id, ri.result_date, ri.score, ui.username, ui.nickname, gi.title FROM result_info AS ri LEFT JOIN user_info AS ui ON ui.username = #{username} AND ri.user_info_id = ui.id LEFT JOIN game_info AS gi ON ri.game_info_id = gi.id LEFT JOIN result_pose AS rp ON ri.id = rp.result_info_id WHERE ri.user_info_id = (SELECT id FROM user_info WHERE username = #{username}) AND rp.pose_filename IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ri.result_date DESC;

SELECT ri.game_info_id, gi.audio_filename, gi.background_filename, gi.pose_filename AS game_pose_filename, rp.pose_filename AS my_pose_filename, ri.score, ri.perfect, ri.great, ri.good, ri.bad, ri.max_combo FROM result_info AS ri LEFT JOIN result_pose AS rp ON ri.id = rp.result_info_id LEFT JOIN game_info AS gi ON ri.game_info_id = gi.id WHERE rp.result_info_id = #{resultInfoId} AND ri.user_info_id = (SELECT id FROM user_info WHERE username = #{username});

SELECT ri.game_info_id, rp.pose_filename AS my_pose_filename FROM result_info AS ri LEFT JOIN result_pose AS rp ON ri.id = rp.result_info_id LEFT JOIN user_info AS ui ON ri.user_info_id = ui.id WHERE rp.result_info_id = #{resultInfoId} AND ui.username = #{username}
